stxxl::migrating_stack< CritSize, ExternalStack, InternalStack > Class Template Reference
[Internals]

A stack that migrates from internal memory to external when its size exceeds a certain threshold For semantics of the methods see documentation of the STL std::vector. More...

 Returns true if current implementation is internal, otherwise false.

Detailed Description

template<unsigned CritSize, class ExternalStack, class InternalStack>
class stxxl::migrating_stack< CritSize, ExternalStack, InternalStack >

A stack that migrates from internal memory to external when its size exceeds a certain threshold For semantics of the methods see documentation of the STL std::vector.
